trans-unit.target: 梦魇之月 // 露娜公主

trans-unit.source: Flying As long as it's nighttime, Nightmare Moon gets +2/+2 and has menace. {6}: Transform Nightmare Moon. Anypony may activate this ability or help pay the cost. When they do, they become your friend.

trans-unit.target: 梦魇之月 // 露娜公主
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Flying When this creature transforms into Princess Luna, choose up to six cards you own from outside the game with a moon in their art, then exile those cards. As long as those cards remain exiled, you may cast them, and your friends may cast them with your permission. (Gifts are appreciated.)

trans-unit.resname: PTG·2 | Princess Twilight Sparkle | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: PTG·2 | Princess Twilight Sparkle | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying Other Alicorns, Horses, Pegasi, Ponies, and Unicorns you control get +1/+1. {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: If you control Applejack, Fluttershy, Pinkie Pie, Rainbow Dash, and Rarity, everypony wins the game.

trans-unit.resname: PTG·2 | Princess Twilight Sparkle | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Friendship isn't always easy, but there's no doubt it's worth fighting for!"

trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Rare and mythic rare spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. {1}, {T}, Reveal a My Little Pony® toy you own: Until end of turn, another target creature gains protection from each color in that toy's coat, mane, and outfit.
"I simply cannot let crimes against fabulosity go uncorrected."
